text: Semicassis saburon is a species of large sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Cassidae, the helmet snails and bonnet snails. ==Description== The shell of Semicassis saburon can reach a size of about .Arianna Fulvo et Roberto Nistri, 2005 : 350 coquillages du monde entier, Delachaux et Niestlé (Paris) : 256 p. () ==Distribution== This species is present in the Mediterranean Sea, from Bay of Biscay up to Ghana, in Azores; and in the Canaries. ==References== Category:Cassidae Category:Gastropods described in 1792
title: Semicassis saburon
